Html:
Hi Ohan!

In Vuzix page, Vuzix VR920 is a discontinued product...

The tracking system of the new models (Wrap 920VR and 1200VR) work's the same way with Goblin?(sorry the english)

Thanks for your attention.

Eduardo.

I'm not sure about 1200, but Wrap920 AR tracking is supported with Goblin since version 3.6

Ohan
